modules.text: At Claraluna, they call themselves Memory Designers because they enchant time with their collections of wedding dresses and wedding favors. As a frontend Developer, I was responsible for the creation of their institutional website.

modules.title: The challenge
modules.text:
In 2015 React.js was a new tool that first offered the ability to render pages on the server and return rich HTML. There was a lot of curiosity and desire in the Frontend team to see it in action.

The challenge was balancing training time (particularly on asynchronous event handling) with project budget time.
